title: Add dedicated PWA install/download page at /install route

requirements.text: Add a `/install` route to the TanStack Router configuration in `frontend/src/App.tsx` that renders the existing `InstallPage` component from `frontend/src/pages/InstallPage.tsx`.

quotes: Install the dedicated download/install page please

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /install in the browser renders the InstallPage component without errors.
The /install route is nested under the root layout so TopBar and BottomNav are visible.
The route is accessible from any browser without authentication if appropriate, or within the AuthGate flow consistent with other routes.

requirements.text: Add a visible entry point to the `/install` page from within the app — for example, a menu item or button in the TopBar or BottomNav (or an 'Install App' option in a settings/about area) — so users can easily discover and navigate to the install page.

quotes: Install the dedicated download/install page please

acceptanceCriteria: There is at least one in-app navigation element (link, button, or menu item) that routes the user to /install.
The entry point is labeled clearly, e.g. 'Install App' or 'Download App'.
Clicking the entry point navigates to /install without a full page reload.

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Reuse the existing InstallPage component at frontend/src/pages/InstallPage.tsx — do not recreate it.
Keep all routing within the existing TanStack Router setup in frontend/src/App.tsx.
nonGoals: Creating a new InstallPage component from scratch.
Changing the PWA manifest or service worker configuration.
